mapper.select:
select m.id, m.content, m.send_user_id, m.send_username, m.send_time, m.type_id, m.feather, m.handle_identify, m.msg_status, m.is_top, m.content, mt.name as typeName, md.name as discussionGroupName from m_message m left join m_msg_user mu on m.discussion_group_id = mu.discussion_group_id left join m_discussion_group md on m.discussion_group_id = md.id left join m_type mt on m.type_id = mt.id where mu.receive_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} /*不需要处理消息msgStatus=1历史消息*/
and m.id in
and m.id not in
( select msg_id from m_read where read_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and m.discussion_group_id is not null and m.discussion_group_id != '' /*消息分类*/
and m.type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/*发送时间*/
and to_date(m.send_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and to_date(m.send_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd')
order by is_top desc, m.send_time desc
mapper.sql: id, send_user_id, send_username, send_time, type_id, discussion_group_id, feather, handle_identify, handle_user_id, handle_username, handle_result, estimate_time, finish_time, msg_status, create_time, data_source, exception_table, is_top
mapper.insert: insert into m_message (id, send_user_id, send_username, send_time, type_id, discussion_group_id, feather, handle_identify, handle_user_id, handle_username, handle_result, estimate_time, finish_time, msg_status, create_time, data_source, exception_table, is_top, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discussionGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estimateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into m_message
id,
send_user_id,
send_username,
send_time,
type_id,
discussion_group_id,
feather,
handle_identify,
handle_user_id,
handle_username,
handle_result,
estimate_time,
finish_time,
msg_status,
create_time,
data_source,
exception_table,
is_top,
content,

mapper.update:
update m_message
send_user_id = #{sendUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_username = #{sendUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discussion_group_id = #{discussionGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feather = #{feather,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_identify = #{handleIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_user_id = #{handleUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_username = #{handleUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_result = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estimate_time = #{estimateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
msg_status = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data_source = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exception_table = #{exceptionTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update m_message set send_user_id = #{sendUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_username = #{sendUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discussion_group_id = #{discussionGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feather = #{feather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_identify = #{handleIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_user_id = #{handleUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_username = #{handleUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_result = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, estimate_time = #{estimateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, msg_status = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_source = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception_table = #{exceptionTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
